text: Amirovo () is a rural locality (a selo) in Khalikeyevsky Selsoviet, Sterlibashevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 483 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 15 km from Sterlibashevo, 6 km from Khalikeyevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlibashevsky District
title: Amirovo, Sterlibashevsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
